title: 向PX458质粒中构建sgRNA (Golden Gate Assembly)

substeps.content: Manually search for 23bp target sites (5'-N(20)NGG-3') within exons of genomic DNA sequence of genes of interest (https://crispor.tefor.net/)
Evaluate target specificities on the website of potential off-target finder. (The target site, which is in the front of genomic DNA sequence, more possibly results in frameshift mutation.)
按照下表配体系（体系减半，按蓝字的体积加），按下图右侧程序在PCR仪中反应
将产物1:250稀释（用水），取2μL用于下一步
按照下表配体系（体系减半，按蓝字的体积加），注意核对所用质粒上的酶切位点是否是Bbs I (Bpi I)，对于PX458-SpCas9而言，是Bbs I (Bpi I)。按下图右侧程序在PCR仪中反应

substeps.title: 5.1转化感受态
substeps.content: 取2μl GGA产物，转化20μL Stbl3感受态，混匀冰上静置10min，42℃热激1min，冰浴2min，涂板Amp+

substeps.title: 5.2挑菌测序
substeps.content: 这个成功率很高，不用菌落PCR鉴定，直接挑菌后送菌液测序就行，用通用引物hU6-F (5'-GAGGGCCTATTTCCCATGATT-3')
